control_attributes.Control: SC-7 (8) ROUTE TRAFFIC TO AUTHENTICATED PROXY SERVERS
control_attributes.control_description: The information system routes [Assignment: organization-defined internal communications traffic] to [Assignment: organization-defined external networks] through authenticated proxy servers at managed interfaces.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization protects against unauthorized physical connections at [Assignment: organization-defined managed interfaces].

Control Statement: The information system routes [Assignment: organization-defined internal communications traffic] to [Assignment: organization-defined external networks] through authenticated proxy servers at managed interfaces.
Control Name: SC-7 (8) ROUTE TRAFFIC TO AUTHENTICATED PROXY SERVERS
